alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Edgefield; Fairfield; Lexington; Newberry; Richland; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 3:22PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Fairfield, southeastern Newberry, southeastern Edgefield, western Lexington, northwestern Aiken, eastern Saluda and northwestern Richland Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 320 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a broken line extending from near Dreher Island State Park to near Aiken Municipal Airport. Movement was east at 20 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Murray Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Batesburg-Leesville, Johnston, Ridge Spring, Edgefield County Airport, Dreher Island State Park, Ballentine, Aiken Municipal Airport, Chapin, Gilbert, Summit, Monetta, Trenton, Ward, Cedar Grove Fire Station, South Shore Marina, Oswald Park, Bundrick Island, Putnam`s Landing, White Rock and Murray. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 15 and 48. Interstate 26 between mile markers 90 and 98. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
